values.text:
Welcome to your 94729873749632 AskHR Virtual Agent.  Im ready to help!

I can help you answer a wide variety of HR-related at 94729873749632 such as questions or initiate a series of HR transactions. I am always learning and if I am not able to answer your question, I will help you find the support you need (create a support ticket/connect to a live chat agent).
Short questions in English with a single topic and keywords work best.

values.text: Remember, while you're in one of these processes you can also ask me to go back a step, or start over.

values: You just need to provide a time with an am/pm indicator, or in 24 hour time. For example, 2:30pm, or 14:30.
We can stop talking about selecting a credit card. If you want to go back to the demonstration, simply click on one of the tiles.
Okay, let's go back a step and find a time that suits you.
Simply enter a day or date for the payment. For example, Next Wednesday or March 24th. Don't enter both a day and date such as Friday 23rd March.
Simply click on one of the credit card account buttons or enter the credit card account number.
Simply enter the amount you'd like to pay off your credit card.
Simply confirm if the payment information is correct - type Yes or No once you have reviewed the information.
Simply choose from a card which can help improve credit scores, provide rewards for customers, and help you save money.
Simply tell me if you have a problem with the statement period issues, card number, card balance, minimum payment or payment due date.
Simply provide a description of your credit score  - for example, low, high, medium - or you can enter a credit score.
We're at the start of this process, I need to know which account you're referring to in order to help with payments.
Simply follow the prompts to provide information about your appointment - such as date, time etc.
We're at the start of this process, I just need to know in which feature you're most interested to help determine which card is best suited to your needs.
Simply follow the prompts to provide the required information.
We're at the start of this process, I just need to know which statement you're referring to in order to help you with your query.
We can stop talking about your bill dispute. If you want to go back to the demonstration, simply click on one of the tiles.
